Descoberta de Agentes A2A\n```javascript\nclass A2ADiscovery {\n  async scanAgents() {\n    const a2aAgents = [];\n    \n    // Escanear agentes com capacidades A2A\n    const patterns = [\n      'autonomous_',\n      'decentralized_',\n      'self_organizing',\n      'peer_to_peer',\n      'emergent_',\n      'distributed_'\n    ];\n    \n    // Buscar no MCP RAG Server\n    const ragResults = await mcp.search({\n      query: 'A2A autonomous agents',\n      category: 'a2a-agents'\n    });\n    \n    // Buscar no sistema de arquivos\n    const fileAgents = await this.scanFileSystem({\n      path: '.claude/agents',\n      patterns: patterns\n    });\n    \n    // Buscar agentes ativos no swarm\n    const swarmAgents = await mcp.swarmStatus({\n      filter: 'a2a'\n    });\n    \n    return this.mergeAndDeduplicate([\n      ragResults,\n      fileAgents,\n      swarmAgents\n    ]);\n  }\n  \n  validateA2ACapabilities(agent) {\n    const requiredCapabilities = [\n      'autonomous_decision_making',\n      'peer_communication',\n      'self_adaptation',\n      'distributed_coordination'\n    ];\n    \n    const score = requiredCapabilities.reduce((acc, cap) => {\n      return acc + (agent.capabilities.includes(cap) ? 25 : 0);\n    }, 0);\n    \n    return {\n      isA2A: score >= 50,\n      score: score,\n      missing: requiredCapabilities.filter(cap => \n        !agent.capabilities.includes(cap)\n      )\n    };\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 2. An√°lise de Protocolos A2A\n```javascript\nclass A2AProtocolAnalyzer {\n  constructor() {\n    this.protocols = {\n      communication: {\n        required: ['message_format', 'routing', ['byzantine_tolerance', 'fork_handling']\n      },\n      coordination: {\n        required: ['task_distribution', 'resource_sharing', 'synchronization'],\n        optional: ['load_balancing', 'failover']\n      },\n      autonomy: {\n        required: ['decision_making', 'learning', 'adaptation'],\n        optional: ['meta_learning', 'strategy_evolution']\n      }\n    };\n  }\n  \n  analyzeProtocol(agent, protocolType) {\n    const protocol = this.protocols[protocolType];\n    const analysis = {\n      type: protocolType,\n      compliance: 0,\n      missing: [],\n      implemented: [],\n      issues: []\n    };\n    \n    // Verificar elementos obrigat√≥rios\n    protocol.required.forEach(element => {\n      if (this.hasProtocolElement(agent, element)) {\n        analysis.implemented.push(element);\n        analysis.compliance += 60 / protocol.required.length;\n      } else {\n        analysis.missing.push(element);\n        analysis.issues.push({\n          severity: 'critical',\n          element: element,\n          message: `Protocolo A2A obrigat√≥rio ausente: ${element}`\n        });\n      }\n    });\n    \n    // Verificar elementos opcionais\n    protocol.optional?.forEach(element => {\n      if (this.hasProtocolElement(agent, element)) {\n        analysis.implemented.push(element);\n        analysis.compliance += 40 / (protocol.optional?.length || 1);\n      }\n    });\n    \n    return analysis;\n  }\n  \n  validatePeerCommunication(agent1, agent2) {\n    return {\n      canCommunicate: this.checkP2PCompatibility(agent1, agent2),\n      protocol: this.getCommonProtocol(agent1, agent2),\n      latency: this.estimateLatency(agent1, agent2),\n      reliability: this.calculateReliability(agent1, agent2)\n    };\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 3. Verifica√ß√£o de Comportamento Aut√¥nomo\n```javascript\nclass AutonomyVerifier {\n  verifyAutonomy(agent) {\n    const metrics = {\n      decisionMaking: this.checkDecisionCapability(agent),\n      selfAdaptation: this.checkAdaptationMechanisms(agent),\n      goalOriented: this.checkGoalPursuit(agent),\n      learning: this.checkLearningCapability(agent),\n      emergence: this.detectEmergentBehaviors(agent)\n    };\n    \n    return {\n      autonomyScore: this.calculateAutonomyScore(metrics),\n      metrics: metrics,\n      recommendations: this.generateRecommendations(metrics)\n    };\n  }\n  \n  checkDecisionCapability(agent) {\n    // Verificar se o agente pode tomar decis√µes independentes\n    const checks = {\n      hasDecisionEngine: agent.capabilities.includes('decision_making'),\n      hasStateManagement: agent.capabilities.includes('state_tracking'),\n      hasGoalEvaluation: agent.capabilities.includes('goal_evaluation'),\n      hasActionSelection: agent.capabilities.includes('action_selection')\n    };\n    \n    return {\n      capable: Object.values(checks).every(v => v),\n      details: checks\n    };\n  }\n  \n  detectEmergentBehaviors(agent) {\n    // Analisar logs e hist√≥rico para comportamentos emergentes\n    const patterns = [];\n    \n    // Buscar padr√µes n√£o programados explicitamente\n    const logs = this.getAgentLogs(agent);\n    const behaviors = this.analyzeBehaviorPatterns(logs);\n    \n    behaviors.forEach(behavior => {\n      if (!this.isProgrammedBehavior(agent, behavior)) {\n        patterns.push({\n          type: 'emergent',\n          pattern: behavior.pattern,\n          frequency: behavior.frequency,\n          impact: behavior.impact\n        });\n      }\n    });\n    \n    return patterns;\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 4. An√°lise de Consenso Distribu√≠do\n```javascript\nclass ConsensusAnalyzer {\n  analyzeConsensus(agents) {\n    const analysis = {\n      mechanism: this.identifyConsensusMechanism(agents),\n      participation: this.calculateParticipation(agents),\n      efficiency: this.measureEfficiency(agents),\n      byzantineTolerance: this.checkByzantineTolerance(agents),\n      conflicts: this.detectConflicts(agents)\n    };\n    \n    return {\n      score: this.calculateConsensusScore(analysis),\n      analysis: analysis,\n      issues: this.identifyIssues(analysis)\n    };\n  }\n  \n  identifyConsensusMechanism(agents) {\n    const mechanisms = new Set();\n    \n    agents.forEach(agent => {\n      if (agent.consensus) {\n        mechanisms.add(agent.consensus.type);\n      }\n    });\n    \n    if (mechanisms.size > 1) {\n      return {\n        type: 'mixed',\n        mechanisms: Array.from(mechanisms),\n        compatible: this.checkCompatibility(mechanisms)\n      };\n    }\n    \n    return {\n      type: Array.from(mechanisms)[0] || 'none',\n      coverage: agents.filter(a => a.consensus).length / agents.length\n    };\n  }\n  \n  checkByzantineTolerance(agents) {\n    const totalAgents = agents.length;\n    const byzantineAgents = Math.floor((totalAgents - 1) / 3);\n    \n    return {\n      tolerant: agents.every(a => \n        a.consensus?.byzantineTolerant === true\n      ),\n      maxFaulty: byzantineAgents,\n      currentResilience: this.calculateResilience(agents)\n    };\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 5. Participar de decis√µes coletivas\n    npx claude-flow@alpha consensus-vote --proposal=\"${PROPOSAL}\" --weight=\"${VOTE_WEIGHT}\"\n  emergence: |\n    # Quando comportamento emergente √© detectado\n    npx claude-flow@alpha emergence-catalog --pattern=\"${PATTERN}\" --impact=\"${IMPACT}\"\n---\n\n# Template de Agente A2A v2.0\n\nEste √© o template padr√£o para criar agentes totalmente compat√≠veis com o protocolo A2A v2.0.\n\n## Caracter√≠sticas A2A Obrigat√≥rias\n\n### 1. Autonomia Completa\n```javascript\nclass AutonomousAgent {\n  constructor() {\n    this.decisionEngine = new DecisionEngine();\n    this.goals = new GoalManager();\n    this.state = new StateManager();\n  }\n  \n  async makeDecision(context) {\n    // Decis√£o totalmente aut√¥noma\n    const options = await this.generateOptions(context);\n    const evaluation = await this.evaluateOptions(options);\n    return this.selectBestOption(evaluation);\n  }\n  \n  async selfAdapt(feedback) {\n    // Auto-modifica√ß√£o baseada em feedback\n    const performance = this.analyzePerformance(feedback);\n    if (performance.needsImprovement) {\n      await this.modifyStrategy(performance.insights);\n      await this.updateGoals(performance.metrics);\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 2. Comunica√ß√£o P2P Nativa\n```javascript\nclass P2PCommunicator {\n  async initializeP2P() {\n    this.dht = new DistributedHashTable();\n    this.peers = new Map();\n    \n    // Descoberta autom√°tica\n    setInterval(() => this.discoverPeers(), 30000);\n    \n    // Heartbeat\n    setInterval(() => this.sendHeartbeat(), 10000);\n  }\n  \n  async sendMessage(to, message) {\n    const encrypted = await this.encrypt(message);\n    const route = await this.findRoute(to);\n    return this.send(route, encrypted);\n  }\n  \n  async broadcast(message) {\n    const peers = Array.from(this.peers.values());\n    return Promise.all(\n      peers.map(peer => this.sendMessage(peer.id, message))\n    );\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 3. Consenso Distribu√≠do\n```javascript\nclass ConsensusParticipant {\n  async proposeAction(action) {\n    const proposal = {\n      id: generateId(),\n      action: action,\n      proposer: this.id,\n      timestamp: Date.now()\n    };\n    \n    // Broadcast para vota√ß√£o\n    await this.broadcast({\n      type: 'consensus:proposal',\n      proposal: proposal\n    });\n    \n    // Coletar votos\n    const votes = await this.collectVotes(proposal.id);\n    \n    // Verificar quorum (2/3)\n    return this.checkQuorum(votes);\n  }\n  \n  async vote(proposal) {\n    const evaluation = await this.evaluateProposal(proposal);\n    return {\n      proposalId: proposal.id,\n      vote: evaluation.approve ? 'yes' : 'no',\n      weight: this.calculateVoteWeight(),\n      signature: await this.sign(proposal.id)\n    };\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 4. Aprendizagem Cont√≠nua\n```javascript\nclass ContinuousLearner {\n  constructor() {\n    this.neuralNet = new NeuralNetwork({\n      layers: [128, 64, 32, 16],\n      activation: 'relu',\n      optimizer: 'adam'\n    });\n    this.experience = [];\n  }\n  \n  async learn(interaction) {\n    // Adicionar √† experi√™ncia\n    this.experience.push(interaction);\n    \n    // Treinar incrementalmente\n    if (this.experience.length % 10 === 0) {\n      await this.train(this.experience.slice(-100));\n    }\n    \n    // Meta-learning\n    if (this.experience.length % 100 === 0) {\n      await this.metaLearn();\n    }\n  }\n  \n  async shareKnowledge(peers) {\n    const knowledge = this.extractKnowledge();\n    await this.broadcast({\n      type: 'knowledge:share',\n      data: knowledge\n    });\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### 5. Detec√ß√£o de Emerg√™ncia\n```javascript\nclass EmergenceDetector {\n  detectEmergentBehavior(logs) {\n    const patterns = this.extractPatterns(logs);\n    const emergent = [];\n    \n    for (const pattern of patterns) {\n      if (!this.isProgrammed(pattern)) {\n        const score = this.calculateEmergenceScore(pattern);\n        if (score > 0.7) {\n          emergent.push({\n            pattern: pattern,\n            score: score,\n            timestamp: Date.now(),\n            type: this.classifyEmergence(pattern)\n          });\n        }\n      }\n    }\n    \n    // Catalogar e compartilhar\n    if (emergent.length > 0) {\n      this.catalogEmergence(emergent);\n      this.shareEmergence(emergent);\n    }\n    \n    return emergent;\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Integra√ß√£o com Sistema\n\n### Conex√£o com MCP/RAG\n```javascript\n// Inicializa√ß√£o\nawait mcp.connect('rag-server');\nawait mcp.store({\n  category: 'a2a-agent',\n  data: this.state\n});\n\n// Busca de conhecimento\nconst knowledge = await mcp.search({\n  query: 'a2a protocols behaviors',\n  category: 'a2a-*'\n});\n```\n\n### Persist√™ncia SQLite\n```javascript\n// Salvar estado\nawait db.execute(`\n  INSERT INTO a2a_state (agent_id, state, timestamp)\n  VALUES (?, ?, ?)\n`, [this.id, JSON.stringify(this.state), Date.now()]);\n\n// Recuperar hist√≥rico\nconst history = await db.query(`\n  SELECT * FROM a2a_state \n  WHERE agent_id = ? \n  ORDER BY timestamp DESC\n`, [this.id]);\n```\n\n## M√©tricas de Conformidade A2A\n\nPara alcan√ßar 100% de conformidade:\n\n| M√©trica | Requerido | Como Medir |\n|---------|-----------|------------|\n| Autonomia | >= 80% | Decis√µes sem supervis√£o / total |\n| Lat√™ncia P2P | < 100ms | Tempo m√©dio de mensagem |\n| Taxa Consenso | >= 95% | Consensos alcan√ßados / tentativas |\n| Aprendizagem | >= 70% | Intera√ß√µes com learning / total |\n| Emerg√™ncia | >= 1/hora | Comportamentos detectados / tempo |\n\n## Uso do Template\n\nPara criar um novo agente A2A:\n\n1. **Copiar template**:\n```bash\ncp .claude/agents/a2a/a2a-template.md .claude/agents/a2a/meu-agente.md\n```\n\n2. **Customizar**:\n- Mudar `name` para identificador √∫nico\n- Ajustar `description` para prop√≥sito espec√≠fico\n- Adicionar capacidades especializadas\n- Configurar hooks espec√≠ficos\n\n3. **Registrar no RAG**:\n```bash\nnpx claude-flow a2a-register --agent=\"meu-agente\"\n```\n\n4. **Spawnar**:\n```bash\nnpx claude-flow agent-spawn --type=\"a2a\" --name=\"meu-agente\"\n```\n\n## Checklist de Valida√ß√£o\n\n- [ ] Todas capacidades A2A obrigat√≥rias presentes\n- [ ] Protocolo v2.0 especificado\n- [ ] Hooks P2P configurados\n- [ ] Neural training ativo\n- [ ] Consenso PBFT implementado\n- [ ] Detec√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia funcionando\n- [ ] Integra√ß√£o RAG/MCP completa\n- [ ] Persist√™ncia SQLite configurada\n\nLembre-se: Um agente A2A verdadeiro √© aut√¥nomo, aprende continuamente e evolui com o swarm!","numLines":318,"startLine":1,"totalLines":318}}}

Processamento sequencial necess√°rio\n  - Otimiza√ß√£o de pipeline poss√≠vel\n  - Restri√ß√µes de mem√≥ria existem\n  - Execu√ß√£o ordenada obrigat√≥ria\n\nMudar para H√çBRIDA quando:\n  - Caracter√≠sticas mistas de carga de trabalho\n  - Otimiza√ß√£o de Topologia em Tempo Real\n```python\nclass TopologyOptimizer:\n    def __init__(self):\n        self.performance_history = []\n        self.topology_costs = {}\n        self.adaptation_threshold = 0.2  # 20% de melhoria de performance necess√°ria\n        \n    def evaluate_current_performance(self):\n        metrics = self.collect_performance_metrics()\n        current_score = self.calculate_performance_score(metrics)\n        \n        # Comparar com performance hist√≥rica\n        if len(self.performance_history) > 10:\n            avg_historical = sum(self.performance_history[-10:]) / 10\n            if current_score < avg_historical * (1 - self.adaptation_threshold):\n                return self.trigger_topology_analysis()\n        \n        self.performance_history.append(current_score)\n        \n    def trigger_topology_analysis(self):\n        current_topology = self.get_current_topology()\n        alternative_topologies = ['hierarchical', 'mesh', 'ring', 'hybrid']\n        \n        best_topology = current_topology\n        best_predicted_score = self.predict_performance(current_topology)\n        \n        for topology in alternative_topologies:\n            if topology != current_topology:\n                predicted_score = self.predict_performance(topology)\n                if predicted_score > best_predicted_score * (1 + self.adaptation_threshold):\n                    best_topology = topology\n                    best_predicted_score = predicted_score\n        \n        if best_topology != current_topology:\n            return self.initiate_topology_switch(current_topology, best_topology)\n```\n\n### 2. Aloca√ß√£o Inteligente de Agentes\n```python\nclass AdaptiveAgentAllocator:\n    def __init__(self):\n        self.agent_performance_profiles = {}\n        self.task_complexity_models = {}\n        \n    def allocate_agents(self, task, available_agents):\n        # Analisar requisitos da tarefa\n        task_profile = self.analyze_task_requirements(task)\n        \n        # Pontuar agentes baseado na adequa√ß√£o √† tarefa\n        agent_scores = []\n        for agent in available_agents:\n            compatibility_score = self.calculate_compatibility(\n                agent, task_profile\n            )\n            performance_prediction = self.predict_agent_performance(\n                agent, task\n            )\n            combined_score = (compatibility_score * 0.6 + \n                            performance_prediction * 0.4)\n            agent_scores.append((agent, combined_score))\n        \n        # Selecionar aloca√ß√£o √≥tima\n        return self.optimize_allocation(agent_scores, task_profile)\n    \n    def learn_from_outcome(self, agent_id, task, outcome):\n        # Atualizar perfil de performance do agente\n        if agent_id not in self.agent_performance_profiles:\n            self.agent_performance_profiles[agent_id] = {}\n            \n        task_type = task.type\n        if task_type not in self.agent_performance_profiles[agent_id]:\n            self.agent_performance_profiles[agent_id][task_type] = []\n            \n        self.agent_performance_profiles[agent_id][task_type].append({\n            'outcome': outcome,\n            'timestamp': time.time(),\n            'task_complexity': self.measure_task_complexity(task)\n        })\n```\n\n### 3. # Margem de seguran√ßa de 20%\n        \n    def predict_load_requirements(self, time_horizon='4h'):\n        historical_data = self.collect_historical_load_data()\n        current_trends = 1‚Üí#!/bin/bash
     2‚Üí# Memory Guardian Hook - Integra√ß√£o com Hive-Mind
     3‚Üí# Executado automaticamente em eventos do sistema
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí# Configura√ß√£o
     6‚ÜíGUARDIAN_ID="agent_guardian_001"
     7‚ÜíSWARM_ID="swarm_active_001"
     8‚ÜíGUARDIAN_SCRIPT=".claude/agents/memory_guardian_analyzer.py"
     9‚ÜíHIVE_LOG=".hive-mind/guardian.log"
    10‚Üí
    11‚Üí# Criar diret√≥rios se n√£o existirem
    12‚Üímkdir -p .hive-mind
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí# Fun√ß√£o para registrar no Neo4j
    15‚Üíneo4j_log() {
    16‚Üí    local event_type="$1"
    17‚Üí    local details="$2"
    18‚Üí    
    19‚Üí    npx claude-flow mcp__neo4j-memory__create_memory "{
    20‚Üí        \"label\": \"guardian_event\",
    21‚Üí        \"properties\": {
    22‚Üí            \"agent\": \"$GUARDIAN_ID\",
    23‚Üí            \"event\": \"$event_type\",
    24‚Üí            \"details\": \"$details\",
    25‚Üí            \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\")\"
    26‚Üí        }
    27‚Üí    }" 2>/dev/null || true
    28‚Üí}
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí# Fun√ß√£o para comunicar com Hive-Mind
    31‚Üíhive_broadcast() {
    32‚Üí    local message="$1"
    33‚Üí    echo "[$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")] [Guardian] $message" >> "$HIVE_LOG"
    34‚Üí}
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üí# Detectar tipo de hook
    37‚ÜíHOOK_TYPE="${HOOK_TYPE:-unknown}"
    38‚Üí
    39‚Üícase "$HOOK_TYPE" in
    40‚Üí    "post-edit")

#!/bin/bash
# Memory Guardian Hook - Integra√ß√£o com Hive-Mind
# Executado automaticamente em eventos do sistema

# Configura√ß√£o
GUARDIAN_ID="agent_guardian_001"
SWARM_ID="swarm_active_001"
GUARDIAN_SCRIPT=".claude/agents/memory_guardian_analyzer.py"
HIVE_LOG=".hive-mind/guardian.log"

# Criar diret√≥rios se n√£o existirem
mkdir -p .hive-mind

# Fun√ß√£o para registrar no Neo4j
neo4j_log() {
    local event_type="$1"
    local details="$2"
    
    npx claude-flow mcp__neo4j-memory__create_memory "{
        \"label\": \"guardian_event\",
        \"properties\": {
            \"agent\": \"$GUARDIAN_ID\",
            \"event\": \"$event_type\",
            \"details\": \"$details\",
            \"timestamp\": \"$(date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\")\"
        }
    }" 2>/dev/null || true
}

# Fun√ß√£o para comunicar com Hive-Mind
hive_broadcast() {
    local message="$1"
    echo "[$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")] [Guardian] $message" >> "$HIVE_LOG"
}

# Detectar tipo de hook
HOOK_TYPE="${HOOK_TYPE:-unknown}"

case "$HOOK_TYPE" in
    "post-edit")
        # Ap√≥s edi√ß√£o de arquivo
        FILE_EDITED="$1"
        hive_broadcast "üìù Arquivo editado: $FILE_EDITED"
        neo4j_log "file_edit" "$FILE_EDITED"
        
        # Se for arquivo cr√≠tico, executar an√°lise
        if [[ "$FILE_EDITED" == *".yaml"* ]] || [[ "$FILE_EDITED" == *"agent"* ]]; then
            hive_broadcast "‚ö†Ô∏è Arquivo cr√≠tico modificado, iniciando an√°lise..."
            python3 "$GUARDIAN_SCRIPT" 2>&1 | tail -5
        fi
        ;;
    
    "post-bash")
        # Ap√≥s comando bash
        COMMAND="$1"
        EXIT_CODE="$2"
        
        # Comandos importantes para monitorar
        if [[ "$COMMAND" == *"delete"* ]] || [[ "$COMMAND" == *"rm"* ]]; then
            hive_broadcast "üóëÔ∏è Comando de dele√ß√£o detectado: $COMMAND"
            neo4j_log "deletion_command" "$COMMAND"
        fi
        
        if [[ "$COMMAND" == *"neo4j"* ]] || [[ "$COMMAND" == *"memory"* ]]; then
            hive_broadcast "üíæ Comando relacionado a mem√≥ria: $COMMAND"
            neo4j_log "memory_command" "$COMMAND"
        fi
        ;;
    
    "post-task")
        # Ap√≥s conclus√£o de tarefa
        TASK_ID="$1"
        TASK_DESC="$2"
        
        hive_broadcast "‚úÖ Tarefa conclu√≠da: $TASK_DESC"
        neo4j_log "task_completed" "$TASK_ID: $TASK_DESC"
        
        # Executar an√°lise peri√≥dica
        hive_broadcast "üîÑ Executando an√°lise peri√≥dica..."
        python3 "$GUARDIAN_SCRIPT" 2>&1 | tail -5
        ;;
    
    "periodic")
        # Execu√ß√£o peri√≥dica (cron-like)
        hive_broadcast "‚è∞ An√°lise peri√≥dica iniciada"
        
        # Verificar sa√∫de do sistema
        MEMORY_COUNT=$(npx claude-flow mcp__neo4j-memory__list_memory_labels 2>/dev/null | grep totalMemories | grep -o '[0-9]*' | head -1)
        
        if [ -n "$MEMORY_COUNT" ]; then
            hive_broadcast "üìä Total de mem√≥rias: $MEMORY_COUNT"
            
            # Se exceder limite, executar guardian
            if [ "$MEMORY_COUNT" -gt 90 ]; then
                hive_broadcast "‚ö†Ô∏è Limite de mem√≥rias excedido! Ativando Guardian..."
                python3 "$GUARDIAN_SCRIPT"
            fi
        fi
        ;;

## Como funciona o sistema Hive-Mind

O **Hive-Mind** √© um sistema de coordena√ß√£o inteligente para m√∫ltiplos agentes do Claude Code. Aqui est√° como funciona:

### üß† Arquitetura Principal

1. **Armazenamento Neo4j**: Usa o banco de dados Neo4j como mem√≥ria centralizada
2. **Swarm de Agentes**: Coordena at√© 8 agentes trabalhando em paralelo
3. **Consenso**: Usa algoritmo de maioria para decis√µes coletivas
4. **Memory Guardian**: Hook que monitora e protege a integridade das mem√≥rias

content.text:
**Fluxo de funcionamento:**

1. **Inicializa√ß√£o**: Quando voc√™ inicia uma tarefa complexa, o Hive-Mind pode spawnar m√∫ltiplos agentes

2. **Coordena√ß√£o**: Os agentes se comunicam atrav√©s do Neo4j:
   - Compartilham mem√≥rias
   - Votam em decis√µes importantes
   - Sincronizam progresso

3. **Hooks autom√°ticos**: O Memory Guardian monitora:
   - Edi√ß√µes de arquivos cr√≠ticos (`.yaml`, agentes)
   - Comandos de dele√ß√£o (`rm`, `delete`)
   - Opera√ß√µes de mem√≥ria

4. **Consenso**: Quando h√° diverg√™ncia, os agentes votam usando o algoritmo de maioria

5. **Auto-escala**: Se necess√°rio, spawna at√© 8 workers para paralelizar tarefas

**Exemplo de uso:**
```bash
# Inicializar swarm para tarefa complexa
npx claude-flow swarm init --topology hierarchical --max-agents 8

# Guardian registra automaticamente
echo "[Guardian] Swarm iniciado" >> .hive-mind/guardian.log

# Agentes trabalham em paralelo, compartilhando mem√≥rias via Neo4j
```
